s.text: tend to find themselves in that position of of having to be uh sort of part of the secretarial pool it might not be called that but that boils down to what it is

no exactly i know and you know just another whole thing i work at Manpower Temporary Services so i see i see the work force out there and i see a lot of um like what's just what's going on and i'm finding that
well the the the changes of course in the past past generation are the women in the work force

and uh just because this Sunday past Sunday was Mother's Day of course there was some articles in the newspaper about the uh mother s in the work force and that has that has certainly made a tremendous difference in society
so i suspect that that may have had more to do with uh changes in society than anything else is the number of the women in the work force
